CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
CurrentVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Actionable card based Loop components
OldVersion.description: Add a Microsoft 365 app that supports link unfurling with an actionable card-based Loop component, and Outlook will show the component when inserting supported links in your email messages. You will be able to choose between the new embedded card or a link when sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
CurrentVersion.description: Search now returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. Note: We have updated the release phase to show the current state.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
OldVersion.description: Search now returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. Note: We have updated the release phase to show the current state.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
OldVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Exchange: High Volume Email for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: High Volume Email is a new service for line of business applications and other high-volume SMTP scenarios that enables you to send internal messages beyond the current limits of Exchange Online.

OldVersion.title: Exchange: High Volume Email for Microsoft 365
OldVersion.description: High Volume Email is a new service for line of business applications and other high-volume SMTP scenarios that enables you to send internal messages beyond the current limits of Exchange Online.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – pin post to leadership corner
CurrentVersion.description: Admins and corporate communicators will be able to pin one post that will show at the top of everyone's leadership corner

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – pin post to leadership corner
OldVersion.description: Admins and corporate communicators will be able to pin one post that will show at the top of everyone's leadership corner

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
CurrentVersion.description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document, rather than operating in large part against the entire document.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
OldVersion.description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document, rather than operating in large part against the entire document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC environment (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC environment. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Charts, Graphs and Data Analysis in Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description: Use prompts to create charts, graphs, and data analysis in Business Chat.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Updates for font management capabilities
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing updates that provide capabilities for managing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections. This includes the ability to hide the From Microsoft font packages from Change the look, apply a font package in your site templates, and updated availability for the From Microsoft font packages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Refresh queries from Authenticated Data Sources in Excel for the Web
CurrentVersion.description: You can now refresh Power Query data from data sources that require authentication in Excel for the Web.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Refresh queries from Authenticated Data Sources in Excel for the Web
OldVersion.description: You can now refresh Power Query data from data sources that require authentication in Excel for the Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows settings. If a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows settings. If a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
